name: Suffocation, Mass
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions as suffocation except as noted above. Note that the duration of this spell is much longer, forcing those suffering from the effect to make far more Fortitude saves to stave off eventual suffocation.
target_zh: 每2级一个活物 (互相之间距离不超过30尺)
text_zh:
这个法术运作方式如同绞杀 (Suffocation)，除了上述部分。

注意，本法术持续时间更长，如果一个生物想免于最终的彻底窒息，必须在充满痛苦的法术持续时间中通过更多次的强韧检定。
